data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 29 January 2022
data.news_body:
In furtherance to our intimation dated 21.01.2022, we hereby inform you that the Board at its meeting held today, 30.10.2021 has inter alia considered and approved the unaudited financial statements (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended 31.12.2021.

Pursuant to regulation 33 of the ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we enclosed the unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended 31 December 2021 and Limited review report on unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended 31.12.2021 issued by our statutory auditor M/s Walker Chandiok & Co LLP.

Unaudited financial statements (standalone and consolidated) alongwith Limited review report will be uploaded on the Company's website www.ambergroupindia.com.

The meeting commenced at 14:00 Hours and concluded at 15:25 Hours.

data.caption: Financial Results Quarter Ended 30 June 2021
data.news_body:
In furtherance to our intimation dated 30July 2021, we hereby inform you that the Board at its meeting held today, 7 August 2021 has inter alia considered and approved the unaudited financial statements (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended 30 June 2021.

Pursuant to regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended, we enclosed :

a) The unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended 30 June 2021, is annexed herewith as 'Annexure A';
b) Limited review report on unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended 30 June 2021 issued by our statutory auditor M/s Walker Chandiok & Co LLP, is annexed herewith as 'Annexure B'.

The meeting Commenced at 1 :30 p.m. and concluded at 2:50 p.m.

We request you to take the above on record and that the same be treated as compliance under applicable regulation(s) under the SEBI Listing Regulations.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31 March 2021
data.news_body:
In furtherance to our intimation dated 13 May 2021, we hereby inform you that the Board at its meeting held today, 22.05.2021 has inter alia considered and approved the audited financial statements (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended 31 March 2021.
Please find enclosed the following :
1. Audited financial statements (standalone and consolidated) of the Company, as per the Indian Accounting Standard ('INDAS') for the quarter and financial year ended 31 March 2021 along with Auditors Report thereon with unmodified opinion on the financial statements.
Audited financial statements (standalone and consolidated) alongwith Auditor's report will be uploaded on the Company's website www.ambergroupindia.com.
The meeting Commenced at 3:15 p.m. and concluded at 4:45 p.m.
